```{r pressure, echo=FALSE}
continous_vars<-c()
discrete_vars<-c()
for (col in names(train)){
                if (nrow(unique(train[col]))>26){
                                continous_vars<-c(continous_vars,col)
                }
                else {
                                discrete_vars<-c(discrete_vars,col)
                }
}
#Scatterplots - continous

for (col in continous_vars){
                train_filter<-train[!is.na(train[col]),]
plot<-ggplot(train_filter,aes_string(x=col,y=train_filter$SalePrice))+geom_point()+ggtitle(col)
ggsave(plot,file=paste0("./plots/",col,".png"),width=14,height=10,units="cm")
}

#Boxplots - discrete

for (col in discrete_vars){
                train_filter<-train[!is.na(train[col]),]
                train_filter$col_factor<-factor(x=train_filter[[col]],levels=sort(unique(train_filter[[col]])),
                                            labels=as.character(sort(unique(train_filter[[col]]))))
                #train_filter[col]<-as.character(train_filter[col])
plot<-ggplot(train_filter,aes_string(x=train_filter$col_factor,y=train_filter$SalePrice))+geom_boxplot()+ggtitle(col)+ theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90, vjust = 0.5, hjust=1))
ggsave(plot,file=paste0("./plots/",col,".png"),width=14,height=10,units="cm")
}

plot_grob<-arrangeGrob(grobs=plot_list)
pdf('Scatterplot_1_var.pdf')
grid.arrange(plot_grob)
dev.off
#Scatterplots - continous+discrete
```
